name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF to Image Converter/Convert PDF to PNG&JPG

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert PDF files to various image formats with ease. Features quality control, single-page and multi-page conversions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PDF to Image Converter allows you to easily convert PDF files into multiple image formats. Whether you need a single page or an entire PDF document, this extension has you covered. Choose from PNG, JPEG, or GIF formats, and control the quality of the resulting image. The extension is perfect for professionals who need quick and reliable PDF-to-image conversions.
